text: @NYGovCuomo How can we possibly trust your decision making? Aren’t you the same man that decided that forcing sick COVID-19 patients into nursing homes was a safe approach? How has that worked out? Now borrowing money from pention fund? I think it’s time for me to join the wave and flee NY!
